name: Hugging Face Question Natural Language Inference
description: Question Natural Language Inference using models hosted in Hugging Face repository.
input: It takes in a DataFrame as input with multiple sentences with first sentence being a question ending with a question mark.

fields.name: preloaded_model
fields.title: Model to be used for Natural Language Inference
fields.description: Infers if the sentences are entailment(hypothesis is true), contraction(hypothesis is false) or neutral(no relationship between hypothesis and the premise).

fields.name: custom_model
fields.title: Custom model name
fields.description: Model name to pull model from Hugging Face repo.
